body.p: The classification and presentation requirements of this IFRS apply to all recognised non‑current assets and to all disposal groups of an entity. The measurement requirements of this IFRS apply to all recognised non‑current assets and disposal groups (as set out in paragraph 4), except for those assets listed in paragraph 5 which shall continue to be measured in accordance with the Standard noted.
